title: Lady Windermere's Fan - values and society

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Wilde uses literary elements and techniques to convey the values of the characters and the nature of their society.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Wilde uses literary elements and techniques to convey the values of the characters and the nature of their society.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
